text: Ioannis Georgiou "Yanis" Varoufakis (, ; born 24 March 1961)officially (), Hellenic Parliament: MPs' contact details is a Greek economist, academic and politician. He was the Greek Minister of Finance from January to July 2015, when he resigned. Varoufakis was a Syriza member of the Hellenic Parliament (MP) for Athens B from January to September 2015. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Greek politicians Category:Greek economists Category:Alumni of the University of Birmingham
title: Yanis Varoufakis
